Class Functions

java.lang.Object
  Functions

 class Functions
extends java.lang.Object

It contains all the static methods to be used commonly by the Board, AI, and StartGame classes. It also has add-on features of the game.

Version:
( 1.0 [24/12/15] )
Author:
(Mehul Ahal)

Functions

Method Detail

buildShip

public static void buildShip(Board boards,
                             java.lang.String ship,
                             java.awt.Point point,
                             int direct)
Method buildShip builds Ships according to the given Point and direction. makeShip lets only the possible and legal from buildShip exist.

Parameters:
boards - Any of the Boards
ship - The Ship's name
point - the Point from where the Ship will be constructed
direct - The direction of the buliding Point of the Ship form the given 'point' : direct=0 for vertical, and direct=1 for vertical

makePoint

public static java.awt.Point makePoint(java.lang.String cord)
Method makePoint converts a coordinate in the form af a String (as in an input) to a Point, and returns it. It is a mirror-method of 'toCord'

Parameters:
cord - The input form to be converted
Returns:
The converted Point

monologue

public static void monologue()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Method monologue displays demoralising messages from the Computer when damage is dealt to the Player.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

nullify

public static void nullify(java.awt.Point[] guesses)
Method nullify makes all the elements of a given Point[] as 'null'.

Parameters:
guesses - A Point[] to be nullified

pause

public static void pause()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Method pause pauses/counts down from a given int every second (1000 milliseconds).

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

placeShip

public static void placeShip(Board boards,
                             Ship ship)
Method placeShip places a made virtual Ship physically on the given Board.

Parameters:
boards - Any of the Boards
ship - The Ship that needs the physical interpretation

randomInt

public static int randomInt(int low,
                            int high)
Method random generates a random int between a given range, and returns it.

Parameters:
low - The lower limit of the required 'int'
high - The upper limit of the required 'int'
Returns:
The pseudo-random int between low and high

stats

public static void stats(Board playerBoard)
Method stats displays the statistics in-between a running game.

Parameters:
playerBoard - The Player's Board

toCord

public static java.lang.String toCord(java.awt.Point point)
Method toCord converts a coordinate in the form of a Point to a String, and returns it. It is a mirror-method of 'makePoint'

Parameters:
point - The Point that needs to be converted
Returns:
The String interpretation of it (Eg:- (0,0) -> A1)

toInt

public static int toInt(java.lang.String strNum)
Method toInt converts a given String (only if it is between a range of 1 and 10) to an int, and returns it, or a negative value otherwise. It is an adaptation of Integer.parseInt (), but to only accomodate the range of a Board (1-10).

Parameters:
strChar - The number in the form of a digit, that is to be converted
Returns:
The converted 'int' form
